pirimiya “pora “wimeth gahaniya “baduwa“ wimeth maha thiyariya eyayi.meya ada eeye siddha wuna deyak noweyi.kawadawathma mewage deyak liyanna oone kiyala mage hithata danila thibune nathi wunath maha pirimi eka thanakata set wela manasin lingika santharpanaye yedena ganu gana katha karala swayan windanaye yedanakota eewa gana eka wachanayak hari liwwe naththan unge ponna kam walata hamadama aathal dena kali api wewi.samahara wita ehew porak meka kiyawala aayemath pirisak ekka set wela swayan windanaye yedenakota uuta mehothakata hari meka mathak weyi.maha dawadi ekka sithawan badagena inna me piriminta thamange ganiwa pirisak madde bedagena aathal ganna kiwwoth menawa wewida?thamange ganita hara anik hama gahaniyakatama baduwak,wesiyak,kallak kiyala nirwachana dena napunsaka purusha porawalwalata awasanayata kiyannata deyak atha.
